title: sashimukhi saraswathi
sahitya: sashi mukhi saraswati lOkaikavasi uvatiasamA na sangItapriyE satbhaktahitE (sashi) anupallavi   pashu patIswara priyanujE           kushalavAdi sEvita (sashi)caraNamvArija lOcani vAkdEvi varadE !         bhArati para dEvatE mahitE !         nAradAdi  sukhamuni pUjita         nIraja pada ugaLE ! namastE  (sashi)
